meanings.sent1: I am winterising my garden by covering the plants with mulch.
meanings.sent2: She winterises her car by checking the antifreeze levels.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels are winterising their home by gathering nuts and seeds.
meanings.sent4: The birds are winterising their nests with extra insulation.
meanings.sent5: He winterises his house by sealing the windows and doors tightly.

meanings.definition: The process of making something ready for winter.
meanings.sent1: Winterising is important to protect plants from the cold.
meanings.sent2: The winterising of the house involves insulating the pipes.
meanings.sent3: The animals had a meeting to discuss the winterising of their burrows.
meanings.sent4: The winterising of the car was completed just in time for the first snowfall.
meanings.sent5: The winterising of the garden shed was a family project this year.
